outputs.output_descr: The  UN/UNDP's support to election processes throughout the world is demand-driven and support varies from institutional reform to civic education to the coordination of resources for electoral support. In 1994 the Mexican Government requested the UN's support  to provide technical assistance to domestic observers. For each of the subsequent five federal elections (between 1994 and 2009), the Mexican Government provided financial support for national electoral observation. UNDP's role was to manage, monitor the resources and provide technical support to domestic observers.
outputs.output_title: PROYECTO  DE APOYO A LA OBSERV

project_descr: Tiene como finalidad apoyar la consolidación de la credibilidad, legitimidad y transparencia en el desarrollo del proceso electoral federal 2012.
project_title: PROYECTO  DE APOYO A LA OBSERVACIÓN ELECTORAL 2012
